mapper.select: select t_id, t_name, t_code, s_id, r_id, test1, test2 from track where t_id = #{tId}
mapper.insert: insert into track(t_name, t_code, s_id, r_id, test1, test2) values (#{tName}, #{tCode}, #{sId}, #{rId}, #{test1}, #{test2})

insert into track(t_name, t_code, s_id, r_id, test1, test2) values
(#{entity.tName}, #{entity.tCode}, #{entity.sId}, #{entity.rId}, #{entity.test1}, #{entity.test2})

insert into track(t_name, t_code, s_id, r_id, test1, test2) values
(#{entity.tName}, #{entity.tCode}, #{entity.sId}, #{entity.rId}, #{entity.test1}, #{entity.test2})
on duplicate key update t_name = values(t_name), t_code = values(t_code), s_id = values(s_id), r_id = values(r_id), test1 = values(test1), test2 = values(test2)
mapper.update:
update track
t_name = #{tName},
t_code = #{tCode},
s_id = #{sId},
r_id = #{rId},
test1 = #{test1},
test2 = #{test2},
where t_id = #{tId}
